    • Method Detail

      • calculateMoves

        public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<Move> calculateMoves(Coordinate from)
        Description copied from class: Piece
        Calcualtes the legal moves of the piece from the given coordinate. The returned moves are all of the piece's legal moves, regardless of the board position, as the piece does not know the board position. It is the role of Position to remove from the returned list any moves that are illegal in the specific board position.
        Specified by:
        calculateMoves in class Piece
